DOC.brief_summary: 1. The safety of LY317615 and any side effects that might be associated with the drug. 2. Whether LY317615, can help patients with brain tumors.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of LY317615 in Patients With Brain Tumors
DOC.criteria: You must be at least 18 years old You must have been diagnosed with a recurrent brain tumor by MRI or CT scan You must be able to swallow the LY317615 tablets You are a woman who is pregnant or breastfeeding In view of your doctor, you have significant heart, liver, kidney, or psychiatric disease
